sentences.en: By understanding these constraints, we begin to understand why some people march to a different drumbeat.
sentences.cn: 了解这些限制条件后，我们明白了为什么有些人在齐步走时跟随不同的鼓点行进。

sentences.en: This year Drumbeat focused on 'education for the open web'.
sentences.cn: 今年它集中于‘关于开放式网络的教育’。

sentences.en: The drumbeat of crisis around the world sounded elsewhere as well.
sentences.cn: 全球危机的鼓声在其他地方也可听到。
